patthana16.68:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nacittasampayutto
patthana16.68:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.68:1.1_2: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
patthana16.68:1.1_3: cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.68:2.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
